title: Help?
body: I got a warning for being toxic? im never toxic doe

replies.body:
~~but who was phone?~~

That won't solve anything. You'll get the warning if you're reported by enough people within a certain period of time. By any chance did you verse a premade that *could* have gotten on your bad side?

Well, if you're reported enough, then a Riot employee will review your case and decide whether or not you should be banned, and for how long.

Short answer, probably not, if this was a one-off thing.
